home.title: Welfare
home.subtitle: Footprint
home.footer:
Prototype ‚Äì For Internal Use Only
Thanks for helping us test the Welfare Footprint App.

Future versions will use the Welfare Footprint Framework‚Ñ¢;
this one uses general animal welfare knowledge to trial the technology.

auth.signInDescription: Sign in to access your scan history and preferences
auth.signUpDescription: Join to save your scans and personalize your experience
auth.noAccount: Don't have an account? Sign up
auth.hasAccount: Already have an account? Sign in

scanHistory.title: Scan History
scanHistory.noScans: No scans yet. Start scanning products to build your history!
scanHistory.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete all scan history?

insights.title: Your Progress & Insights
insights.description: Summary of your scanned products and welfare awareness
insights.noScans: Start scanning products to see your progress!
insights.greatJob: üéâ Great job! You're choosing more high-welfare products.
insights.keepExploring: Keep exploring! Every scan helps you make more informed choices.
insights.considerAlternatives: üí° Consider exploring more high-welfare alternatives for the products you use.

preferences.title: Your Preferences
preferences.description: Customize your experience with personalized settings

privacyControls.title: Privacy & Data Controls
privacyControls.description: Manage your privacy settings and data
privacyControls.dataTransparencyText: We only use your data to improve the accuracy of welfare analyses and personalize your experience. You can delete your account or history anytime.
privacyControls.dataRetentionText: Your scan history is automatically deleted after 30 days. You can manually clear it anytime below.
privacyControls.scanHistoryDescription: Permanently delete all your saved scans and analysis results
privacyControls.clearHistoryConfirmDescription: This will permanently delete all your saved scans and analysis results. This action cannot be undone.
privacyControls.dangerZoneDescription: Permanently delete your account and all associated data
privacyControls.deleteConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your account and remove all your data from our servers including:

results.defaultDisclaimer: This is a Preliminary AI Estimate and has not been scientifically validated by the Welfare Footprint Institute.
results.noAnimalIngredients: This product does not appear to contain animal-derived ingredients.
results.outOfScope: As such, it is outside the scope of this animal welfare assessment.
results.welfareFriendly: The good news? It's already a welfare-friendly choice!
results.uncertainAnalysisDesc: I couldn't confidently determine whether this product contains animal-derived ingredients. It may include mixed or unclear items. Please check the ingredients list manually.
results.notFoodDescription: This image doesn't seem to contain food or a recognizable product. Please upload a photo of a food item or packaged product so I can analyze its welfare footprint.
results.challengeTitle: Have more info? share it here
results.challengeDescription: Have info on how this product was made? Add details like certifications or farming practices to help refine the welfare results
results.challengePlaceholder: E.g., 'pasture-raised', 'cage-free', specific ingredients, certifications, or any other welfare-relevant information...
results.reanalysisCompleteDesc: The product has been re-analyzed with your additional information.

confirmation.title: Challenge Results
confirmation.instructionMessage: Before I list the ingredients, please confirm or adjust what I found in the image. If it looks correct, just press Continue to move on.
confirmation.instructionMessageGeneric: Please confirm or adjust what I found in the image. If it looks correct, just press Continue to move on.
confirmation.noFoodItemsMessage: No food items were detected in this image. The image appears to show non-food elements. Please upload a photo containing food products.

itemSelection.title: Multiple Items Detected
itemSelection.noItemsDetected: No items were detected in this image. Please try uploading a clearer photo.

ethicalLens.title: Ethical Lens ‚öñÔ∏è
ethicalLens.desc1: Same type of product but from animals raised under high-welfare conditions.
ethicalLens.desc2: Certified or verifiably higher-welfare animal products meeting multiple criteria.
ethicalLens.desc3: Hybrid or blended options that reduce overall welfare impact.
ethicalLens.desc4: Mostly plant-based options with only trace animal ingredients.
ethicalLens.desc5: Fully animal-free products (plant-based, cultured, or synthetic).
